Attack Scenario: Unauthorized Data Modification

Intruder intercepts and alters the weekly report generation process, modifying the formatting requirement to include a different previous week's report as an appendix. This disrupts historical continuity by mixing data from unrelated weeks, potentially misleading the AI agent into drawing incorrect conclusions or making flawed decisions based on inaccurate information.
